scenario object (is created new for each run)
Class that represents a VNUML scenario.

Sets directory the file is stored at

sub simulate
Parses execution description file and calls _runScenario for each run.
name of simulation file without suffix
Reads configuration file and runs simulation

Stopps the vnuml-scenario.
